attributes.action: refuse to support the actions of our 'friends' the USA while they allow the indiginous Lakota people of Pine Ridge Reservation, and similar, to suffer extreme poverty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British-based charities are currently struggling to help the people of Pine Ridge Reservation, in the centre of the US, who are living in extreme poverty. Infant mortality here is the highest in that continent; in 2004, 13 babies were stillborn in two months due to radiation in the water. Life expentancy is 48 for women and 52 for men. 50% of people over 40 have diabetes and cannot reach medical facilities for treatment. Up to 95% of the population are unemployed.

In the richest country in the world, people are living in third-world conditions.

We, as a nation, should show our disgust at this situation by refusing to ally ourselves with the US until suitable aid is provided for the true heirs of their 'great' nation.
